text:
Noorderhaaks or "Razende Bol" is an uninhabited small island of the province of North Holland, the Netherlands. It belongs to the municipality of Texel. It covers an area of 4 km².
Noorderhaaks makes part of the West Frisian Islands (Dutch: "Waddeneilanden"). It is the most western island.
It lies southwest of the island of Texel.
